name: Neon Blast (itch) (Blue Lightning Daniel)
description: A wonderful FPS Game that puts you in a space where you can battle other player and Also We own a non profiting game and would like you to please donate otherwise we might no see more updates anytime soon so please donate Also Includes a nametag where you can name yourself and play but you have the right to use any word there just not offensive and sort of 13+
